PreceptDef.label: lowered
PreceptDef.description: Royalty demands swift action; thus, the cooldown of permits is lessened, allowing for a more rapid response to the ever-changing whims of noble desire.

PreceptDef.label: increased
PreceptDef.description: Patience is a virtue, and now a necessity, as the cooldown of permits is doubled. Time crawls as the court awaits the next invocation of royal privilege.
